name: John Doe
title: Executive Director
bio: John leads SwahiliPot Hub with a passion for technology and community development. He has over 10 years of experience in the tech industry and is committed to empowering youth through innovation.

name: Jane Smith
title: Programs Director
bio: Jane oversees all programs and initiatives at SwahiliPot Hub, ensuring they align with our mission and create meaningful impact. She brings extensive experience in program development and community engagement.

name: David Mwangi
title: Technology Lead
bio: David leads our technology department, developing innovative solutions and mentoring youth in software development. He is passionate about using technology to solve local challenges.

name: Sarah Ochieng
title: Arts & Culture Manager
bio: Sarah brings her extensive background in arts to develop and manage our creative programs and cultural initiatives. She is dedicated to preserving and promoting local cultural heritage.

name: Michael Kamau
title: Community Engagement Manager
bio: Michael works closely with our community partners and stakeholders to build strong relationships and collaborative initiatives. He is skilled in community organizing and partnership development.

name: Grace Wanjiku
title: Communications Manager
bio: Grace leads our communications strategy, sharing SwahiliPot Hub's story and impact with the world. She has a background in digital marketing and content creation.

name: Peter Njoroge
title: Engineering Manager
bio: Peter oversees our engineering projects and infrastructure, ensuring we have the technical foundation to support our programs and initiatives. He specializes in software architecture and systems design.

name: Amina Hassan
title: Swahili Tech Women Lead
bio: Amina leads our Swahili Tech Women program, working to increase the participation and success of women in technology fields. She is passionate about gender equality in STEM.
